name: openclaw_skill_development
description: Custom AI agent skill development for OpenClaw agents. Delivers a complete, installable skill package with SKILL.md, scripts, configuration, and documentation. Skills can automate any workflow: DeFi operations, social media, monitoring, security scanning, API integrations, data pipelines, browser automation, and more. Each skill is tested, documented, and ready to install via clawhub or direct copy.
